my_dic: {"question": "how to fine-tune llama-2", "answer": "To fine-tune llama-2, you can use Q Laura to instruct and ultimately push the model to the Hugging Face model Hub. You can create a repository in the model Hub and have the lower adapters there for later use. The process involves using a custom dataset in CSV format with three columns: instruction, input, and output. The instruction column provides the instructions for fine-tuning, while the input and output columns contain the corresponding input and output data.", "sources": ["https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eeM6V5aPjhk", "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3fsn19OI_C8"]}
